eg.document

Class TextDocument

  • java.lang.Object
    • eg.document.TextDocument

  • public class TextDocument
extends java.lang.Object
    The text document to which a file is assigned and which has the components to edit text, control coloring and indentation, set the font and show line numbering

      • colorSearchedText

        public void colorSearchedText(java.lang.String[] searchTerms,
                              boolean constrainWord)
        Colors text elements specified by a array of search terms in the keyword color if the language is not a computer language.
        Parameters:
        searchTerms - the array of Strings that contain search terms to be colored
        constrainWord - true to color only words
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if searchTerms is null or contains empty Strings
